entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @SenTomCotton @realDonaldTrump People are aware of the aluminum & mercury that's been put in other vaccines, causing problems, & are leary of a possible new vaccine giving US the coronavirus, even in a delayed reaction.  Depopulation.??  or just kitchen Sink,to crash economy, they tried everything else.
